text: DO follow the [General Azure SDK Guidelines].
DO locate all source code in the [Azure/azure-sdk-for-ios] GitHub repository.
DO follow Azure SDK engineering systems guidelines for working in the [Azure/azure-sdk-for-ios] GitHub repository.
YOU SHOULD write the client library in Swift 5.

YOU MAY write the client library in Objective-C.

The intent is to ensure that the client library is idiomatic in Swift applications. The library should not make specific accommodations to support Objective-C applications.
